downloadCatalog.missionTextCategory: Welcome to the {{category}} Catalog of Albanian Dairy & Supply Hub (ADSH). Discover our range of high-quality {{category}} products designed to meet your needs.
downloadCatalog.missionTextFull: Welcome to the Full Catalog of Albanian Dairy & Supply Hub (ADSH). Browse our extensive range of products in all categories, crafted with quality and care to serve you better.
downloadCatalog.aboutUsText: ADSH-2014 is a company established in 2014. The staff has been operating since 1995 under the company D&A. The company has over 29 years of experience in the field of raw materials for dairy and pastry shops.
downloadCatalog.productsText: High quality and competitive prices in the market. We have around 200 products available. Some of them can be found below.
downloadCatalog.valuesText: 24-hour service every day of the week for our clients. Quality products and competitive prices. To fulfill the demands of consumers in Albania.

hero.heading: About Us
hero.description: Get to know ADSH, the company's history, vision, mission, and values that the company reflects and strives to convey in the general market!

historySection.heading: ADSH History
historySection.text: ADSH-2014 is a company established in 2014. The staff has been operating since 1995 under the company D&A. The company boasts over 29 years of experience in the field of raw materials for dairy, ice cream, pastry, ovens, packaging, work equipment, etc. Our products have high quality and competitive prices in the market. ADSH has around 200 products available.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To supply our partners with high-quality raw materials and equipment, assisting in improving their products and increasing success in the competitive market.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a leader in the Albanian market in supplying raw materials and equipment for the food industry, bringing innovation and high-quality standards.

values.title: Values
values.text: Quality, Integrity, Customer Commitment, Innovation, Experience.

hero.heading: Articles
hero.description: Stay informed with the latest trends, tips, and knowledge in dairy, ice cream, ovens, and more.

intro.heading: Welcome to Our Blog
intro.description: Browse articles, news, and updates about our products, services, and industry insights.

hero.heading: Home
hero.description: We empower your culinary creations with quality ingredients and supplies. From dairy delights to pastry perfection, we are your trusted partner in culinary excellence.

stats.paragraph: These are some of the statistics that ADSH has achieved over the years in the market.

whoWeAre.description: ADSH-2014 is a company established in 2014. The staff has been operating since 1995 under the company D&A. The company has over 29 years of experience in the field of raw materials for dairy and pastry shops. Our products are of high quality and come with competitive prices!

productCategories.description: Discover our products through digital catalogs divided into categories to enhance your browsing experience.
productCategories.downloadCatalogParagraph: Browse our digital catalogs on our website based on category. Not sure what product you're looking for? Browse the complete catalog or download the full catalog for a more convenient experience. Catalogs for each category can also be downloaded to simplify your experience!

categories.DairyDescription: Primary raw materials for dairy products to assist our clients in producing the highest quality product!
categories.IceCreamDescription: Ingredients for producing ice cream to bring a freshness to life during the hot summer months!
categories.PastryDescription: Products for pastry, cakes, croissants, and more!
categories.PackagingDescription: Plastic packaging for dairy, ice cream, or pastry.
categories.DriedFruitsDescription: Different types of dried fruits for our customers.
categories.EquipmentDescription: Equipment and workwear for food professionals.

blogSection.heading: Articles
blogSection.description: Browse our articles to learn more about our products and their use in your culinary creations. We cover all product categories, offering you tips, recipes, and the latest industry trends. Stay informed and inspired with our regularly updated content.

hero.heading: Products
hero.description: ADSH offers products in several categories of the food industry.

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph: Welcome to ADSH! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you provide while using our website. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your data.

informationCollected.heading: 2. Information We Collect
paragraphs: We may collect various types of information from our users, including but not limited to:
Personal information such as name, email, phone number when you register or contact us.
Technical information such as IP addresses, types of browsers you use, and devices you use to access our site.
Information you provide through contact forms, blog comments, or participation in other interactive activities.

informationUse.heading: 3. Use of Information
paragraphs: The information we collect is used for various purposes, including:
Communicating with users about important matters, including notifications about changes to the privacy policy.
Analyzing trends and user behaviors for marketing purposes.

informationSharing.heading: 4. Sharing of Information
paragraphs: We will not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
When necessary to comply with legal or regulatory requirements.
With our trusted partners who assist us in our business operations, including payment processing and IT services.
In cases of company ownership transfer.

cookies.heading: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
paragraphs: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small files stored on your device to keep track of your preferences and actions while using our site.
You have the option to manage or delete cookies through your browser settings, but please note that some parts of the site may not function properly without them.

dataSecurity.heading: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.paragraph: We take necessary measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These measures include advanced security technologies and strict administrative procedures.

userRights.heading: 7. User Rights
userRights.paragraph: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information that we have recorded. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.

policyChanges.heading: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
policyChanges.paragraph: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately upon posting. We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.heading: 9. Contact
contact.paragraph: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at:

name: Name
uploadAtLeastOneImage: Please upload at least one image.
